fields.text: Thank you for calling Copper, the productivity CRM that handles your busywork so you can focus on building lasting business relationships.
To schedule a live demo of Copper, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we transfer you to our Sales team for a live demo.
To get pricing details and subscription options, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you with a Sales specialist for pricing details.
If you need help with your existing account, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you with a support representative for assistance with your account.
If you are reporting a technical issue, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you with our technical support team.
